steps: Go to the 'Design' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Watermark' button in the 'Page Background' group.
Select 'Custom Watermark' from the dropdown menu.
In the 'Printed Watermark' dialog box, choose the 'Picture Watermark' option.
Click on the 'Select Picture' button and choose the image you want to use as the watermark.
Adjust the settings for the watermark, such as scale, washout, and alignment.
Click 'OK' to apply the custom watermark to the document.
